TopicTitle: [1.1.3] Pulsejet Argus As 014 / As 044 and other WWII german engines

Articles.Content:
@Pagan_Scorpion

If you are not maintaining this I truly enjoy it.
Do you mind if I host/maintain an updated version CKAN. Please let me know

I have also made RSSRO and RP-0 cfgs for it as I said.
I have also located the true argus pulse jet audio, fresh from a restored unit in 2011, I added it as an option in the RO cfg (hope thats ok)

Specs as real life for RSSRO/RP-0 using detailed data Argus/Folke-Wulf > Lockheed to ceria July 1950 to july 1953

Pulse Idle (from no 0m/s or "no speed") thrust mach 0.7 (014) to 0.75 (044) +  RealFuels/SFC corrected AvGas

Ram no thrust under 200m/s overheats mach 1.1 (type 1) to 1.5 (type 2) + RealFuels/SFC corrected kerosene

I also corrected the ramjets to AJE's "ModuleEnginesAJERamjet"

Audio Sampled:


Pulse jet: (pre "full" spec/fuel corrections)

 

Ramjet : (pre "full" spec/fuel corrections & set to true "ramjet")

Edited July 29, 2021 by KarlDunhuff

Update:

The maintainers/dev's of RP/RP0 have informed me these are not inside their vision of a mod intended towards "space programs", and informed me that I should instead "make another mod" with these  pulsejets & ramjets.
Sorry to anyone interested in these inside RO/RP1. I do have a large amount of historical test data/specifications on many 1940's to 1960's pulse and ram jets for anyone interested

..........................

I have, I believe fairly accurately, converted the: (for RSSRO/RP0)

  • as014 > Argus as044 > unlockParts
  • as044 > Ford-Chelomey Pulsejet > supersonicDev
  • (0.544 rescaled copy of) lorin-sanger 1 > FW-PABST (P.1040 or Kayaba Model 1 Ne 01a) 9kN ramjet as tested on DO-17Z/P.13 and recovered in operation Lusty, reverse engineered into Marquardt XRJ-30 & others in 1946-47 > unlockParts
  • lorin-sanger-1 > XRJ47-W-5 (or W-3 more likely from specs) Ramjet > supersonicDev
  • lorin-sanger-2 > RJ43-MA-7 (or MQM) Ramjet > supersonicFlightRP0
  • (1.2 rescaled copy of) lorin-sanger-2 > Stato-Reacteur Ramjet from Nord 1500-Griffon > matureSupersonic

I cant contact OG author sadly

Edited August 4, 2021 by KarlDunhuff

.

Edited April 4, 2022 by spacejet
